info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 5 at 11:07AM CDT by NWS Shreveport LA
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas...
Black Cypress Bayou At Jefferson affecting Marion and Cass Counties.
For the Black Cypress Bayou...including Jefferson...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Black Cypress Bayou at Jefferson.
* WHEN...From Sunday afternoon until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 11.6 feet. - Bankfull stage is 13.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Sunday afternoon and continue rising to 15.0 feet early Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: https://water.noaa.gov/wfo/SHV
The next statement will be issued Sunday morning at 1115 AM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
